dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, wait, so last year, Singles Day brought in, like, just over THIRTY BILLION DOLLARS?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, wait, so last year, Singles Day brought in, like, just over T H I R T Y B I L L I O N D O L L A R S?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: It has become by far and away the largest shopping event in the world, raking in just over $30 billion in gross merchandise volume last yearand sales are expected to hit $37 billion by that same metric this year, according to Forrester Forecasts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I know, right? Like, that's insane! And they expect thirty-seven billion this year! Uh, what?!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I know, right? Like, that's insane! And they expect thirty-seven billion this year! Uh, what?!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...and sales are expected to hit $37 billion by that same metric this year, according to Forrester Forecasts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Thirty-seven billion?! And it's not even just Alibaba anymore, either. Like, a record number of other companies are in on it. Huge.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thirty-seven billion?! And it's not even just Alibaba anymore, either. Like, a record number of other companies are in on it. Huge.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Chinasand the worldsbiggest online shopping event, known as Singles Day, takes place on November 11, with Alibaba and a record number of other Chinese e-commerce companies offering massive discounts over the 24-hour period.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Two hundred thousand brands now! Up from, uh, sixty thousand in 2017. Just wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Two hundred thousand brands now! Up from, uh, sixty thousand in twenty seventeen. Just wild.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...the event boasts over 200,000 participating brandsup from 60,000 in 2017 and just 27 in 2009.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Wild is, um, an understatement! And Taylor Swift is performing at the opening gala? Seriously? How big can this get?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wild is, um, an understatement! And Taylor Swift is performing at the opening gala? Seriously? How big can this get?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alibaba, which kicks off the event by hosting extravagant fashion shows and concerts, is also bringing in more starpower: Taylor Swift is set to perform as the headliner in the opening gala this year...

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And Kim K did a livestream for her fragrances! It's, like, a whole thing now, not just shopping.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And Kim K did a livestream for her fragrances! It's, like, a whole thing now, not just shopping.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...while Kim Kardashian did a livestream on Tmall to launch her fragrances for the shopping festival.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right? Oh, and wait, they're doing a charity drive for the Amazon rainforest? That's, um, pretty cool, actually.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? Oh, and wait, they're doing a charity drive for the Amazon rainforest? That's, um, pretty cool, actually.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Pledging a percentage of sales. But, like, did you see the part about drone delivery? They're testing it!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Pledging a percentage of sales. But, like, did you see the part about drone delivery? They're testing it!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: I did! For expedited shipments! That's, uh, insane. But then, almost a quarter of US retailers are involved now, Apple, Estee Lauder...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I did! For expedited shipments! That's, uh, insane. But then, almost a quarter of U S retailers are involved now, Apple, Estee Lauder...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A larger number of U.S. retailersalmost 25%, according to Adobe, plan to get involved, including big names ranging from Apple to Estee Lauder, posting deals on Alibabas platforms as well as their own U.S. websites.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! But then that survey about, uh, almost eighty percent of Chinese shoppers planning to boycott American goods? That's... a curveball.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! But then that survey about, uh, almost eighty percent of Chinese shoppers planning to boycott American goods? That's... a curveball.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Almost 80% of Chinese shoppers said that they plan to boycott American goods during Singles Day, according to a recent survey from AlixPartners, which predicts the U.S.-China trade war taking a toll on participating U.S. brands this year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Totally! The trade war, um, taking a toll. It's like, this massive, unstoppable force, but with these crazy undercurrents.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally! The trade war, um, taking a toll. It's like, this massive, unstoppable force, but with these crazy undercurrents.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: ...which predicts the U.S.-China trade war taking a toll on participating U.S. brands this year.
